title: Demon Monk - Novel Updates
tags: Dead Protagonist   Demons   Ghosts   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Oneshot
author: Lu Tianyi   吕天逸
description: Ye Shigui had never seen a monk like this before. His greenish-gold eyes were like a demon’s. His silver hair hung like a waterfall. He was as handsome as the strongest sunlight in July. He was so dazzling that people couldn’t look away.>
